## Bladeburner.getCityChaos() method

Get chaos of a city.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCityChaos(name: string): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

number

Chaos in the specified city.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 4 GB

Returns the chaos in the specified city, or -1 if an invalid city was specified.
